Subject: Matrix Gone

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He felt something. 
"The Maxi Matrix..," he wispered to himself.
He opened a panel on his arm, and clicked a button.
His original transport exploded. All contents within blew up, including
his other "bat" body. He hoped he got the Matrix too.

::DrillBit::

He went back to the others. 
"So much for that. Lets get inside."
